comments.body:
This pattern is repeated used in all functions, how about consolidate getClient, IID, and FindVolume into a single call

`client, iid, vol, err = m.getClientIIDAndVolume()`

Combining these calls, though a sensible suggestion, would couple functionalities that should not be.  For instance, `FindVolume` not needed when creating volume.  Also, `getClient`, `IID` caches their value the first time they are called. So subsequent calls only returned the cached value.
